name: Cosmic Invasion (itch)
description:
Good Day!

Hello, this is another game of mine inspired by souls knights and the space itself, have fun!

Goal:
  • Protect the planets and yourself.
  • Eliminate every virus.
  • Eliminate the final boss.
Mechanics: 
  • Avoid and dodge enemies and their projectiles.
  • Collect coins that are dropped by the enemies.
  • Use the coins to upgrade your gun, upgrade your equipment, or heal yourself.
  • Receive different blessings to help you eliminate viruses and save planets.
  • Save 30 planets!
Controls:
  • Use Mouse to aim and shoot.
  • Press A and D to move.
  • Press spacebar to use the jetpack.
  • Press W, A, S, D, to control the jetpack's movement.
  • C, Q, E, X, will be the key binds that will use active skills.
  • W, A, S, D will be the key binds to control the spaceship at the final boss battle.
Features:
  • Has 10 different enemies.
  • Has 9 different blessings to receive.
  • Has increasing difficulty, more enemies will spawn and will be powerful than before!
  • A final Boss, the ultimate test of your skills.
  • Amazing music, Thank you  ALEX_BESSS!
